articles.description: Excerpts from the one-off concert will be screened alongside a 60-minute documentary.
articles.content:
By Mark SavageBBC music reporter
An edited version of Glastonbury's all-star live-stream concert is to be shown on the BBC in the coming weeks.
Featuring sets from Coldplay, Damon Albarn, Haim and … [+2506 chars]

articles.title: From Adele to Elvis: the 10 best Bob Dylan cover versions - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Dylan's voice is not for everyone, but his songwriting is beyond reproach. As he turns 80, here are the most unforgettable Dylan covers
articles.content: There are versions of Dylan songs by such all-time-great artists as Adele, The Beach Boys, David Bowie, Glen Campbell, Johnny Cash, Nick Cave, Cher, Eric Clapton, Joe Cocker, Coldplay, Phil Collins, … [+2000 chars]
